original_title: SLPP seek support to make Mahinda Rajapaksa Prime Minister – MP Channa Jayasumana
original_body_lines: MP Professor Channa Jayasuma says a group from the SLPP have requested the Freedom People's Alliance to support moves to appoint Mahinda Rajapaksa as Prime Minister.
He was responding to questions raised at an event in Anuradhapura on Saturday (25).
